== With out administration privileges == 

=== Automated ways ===
For Unix distributions (Mac OS X or Linux) you could use our [http://cloudobserver.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/CloudLoader/cloud_server_net_setup.sh Cloud Server network build/setup script].

Here is how you can use it: 
{{{
	wget http://cloudobserver.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/CloudLoader/cloud_server_net_setup.sh
	chmod u+x cloud_server_net_setup.sh
	./cloud_server_net_setup.sh
}}}
